features: REDUCES AND PREVENTS BLEEDING AND INFLAMED GUMS - Tooth & Gums Tonic contains pure essential oils and herbs proven to quickly reduce bleeding and inflammation that often lead to halitosis and gum issues.

HELPS ELIMINATE BAD BREATH - Having bad breath can be unpleasant and a cause for embarrassment. The essential oils and herbs don't just mask halitosis, they target the root causes of the odor that are under the gum line for long lasting results.

IDEAL FOR DAILY RINSING - Tooth & Gums Tonic mouth rinse is alcohol free and made with only natural ingredients. Use daily for long term gum care. Contains no artificial colors, sweeteners or preservatives.
All Natural | Alcohol Free | Gluten Free | Non-GMO | Vegan | Made in USA - DENTIST RECOMMENDED
body.description: We harness the power of pure essential oils and herbs to create a healthy oral environment. Use our Naturally Strong, dentist-recommended rinse daily for refreshingly healthy teeth and gums. Reduce harmful bacteria Control bleeding and inflamed gums Eliminate bad breath Relieve dry mouth and mouth sores Use daily for naturally healthy teeth and gums Revitalize oral care routine

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We harness the power of pure essential oils and herbs to create a healthy oral environment. Use our Naturally Strong, dentist-recommended rinse daily for refreshingly healthy teeth and gums. Reduce harmful bacteria Control bleeding and inflamed gums Eliminate bad breath Relieve dry mouth and mouth sores Use daily for naturally healthy teeth and gums Revitalize oral care routine

Powerful herbs and essential oils in Tooth & Gums Tonic were chosen for their healing properties. Cinnamon Bark - an essential oil that reduces bacteria, inflammation, and irritation.Eucalyptus - an essential oil that helps boost circulation and speeds the healing process.Lavender - a soothing essential oil that helps heal damaged tissue.Peppermint - an essential oil that provides overall protection by reducing oral bacteria and inflammation.Red Thyme - an essential oil that has powerful antiseptic properties.Echinacea - a powerful antimicrobial herb that helps stimulate the healing process.Gotu Kola - an herb that has been used for centuries to aid in wound healing.

Refreshing Oral Rinse With Essential Oils for Healthier Teeth and Gums. Stimulating Fluoride-Free Toothpaste for Healthier Teeth and Gums Naturally Revitalizing Essential Oil Concentrate for Dilution with an Oral Irrigator Soothing Gum Care Gel for Inflamed Gums, Oral Sores, and Irritation Exhilarating Breath Freshening Spray for Natural, Long-Lasting Protection Reduces Harmful Bacteria, Inflammation and Bleeding ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Eliminates Bad Breath ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Relieves Mouth Sores ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Relieves Dry Mouth ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Variants Aloe Vera, Xylitol Aloe Vera, Xylitol Size 18 oz. 4 oz. 4 oz. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mouthwash/Healing Tonic
reviews.reviewText: I am not a mouthwash person, but I suppose the "healing tonic" angle made Dental Herb Co.'s Tooth and Gums Tonic worth a try. Wow is this product powerful! The herbal mix feels beneficial compared to synthetic tasting brands like Scope. My dentist noticed an improvement in my gums (no bleeding) and I believe my gum pockets are improving as well. If you are not a regular flosser, this is a great product to improve your mouth health (I prefer thorough use of a plastic toothpick and Dental Herb after). Highly recommend...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff works! Amazing
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is so refreshing with a healthy "sting" without the alcohol. Mouth feels super clean using this stuff and my gums are looking better than ever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Product.
reviews.reviewText: Excellent Product, very healing for gums

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not the best tasting stuff but it is all natural and it keeps my mouth feeling very clean. My dentist recommended it! The price just keeps going up and up, which is not good, soon I will not be able to afford it on my retirement pay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dentist Recommended- Sensitive Friendly
reviews.reviewText: After purchasing this from my dentist per their recommendation, I sought a refill on Amazon because it was the cheapest price available at the time.Because I have a night guard, it's important for me to use a Mouthwash daily buy regular alcohol or non-alcoholic mouthwashes were leaving my mouth dry and killing all of the good bacteria in addition to bad in my mouth.My dentist claims this Mouthwash does a better job killing the bad bacteria and leaving the good.I also have sensitive teeth and gums; this minty fresh tonic is perfect for cleaning without hurting my teeth or gums.The bottle is made of glass because the tonic inside looks a bit milky almost like a live probiotic in kombucha. It does not store well on traditional travel size plastic containers, because the tonic will find a way to leak through those materials. If you're looking for a travel size I don't think Amazon carries it yet, but the producer does on their website.Overall, I reccomend this product for someone looking for a more natural way to rinse their mouth or someone looking for something that works well with dry mouth and sensitive teeth or gums.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mouth rinse is not very pleasant tasting, but it accomplishes its job...reduces gum inflammation and bleeding. It has really helped me. After nightly use for about a month, I really see an improvement.It also lasts a long time--you don't need to use much and it can be diluted with a tiny splash of water to make the taste not as strong. I just bought my second bottle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ridiculously expensive, but high quality
reviews.reviewText: The price is insane, but so far I've put up with it because it's great. No alcohol, no SLS and extremely effective and protecting gums and freshening breath. It was recommended by my dentist after oral surgery, and I continued to use it.This is a luxury item, though, and due to price, I may eventually find something else. Whenever I'm actually at my dentist's office, I pick up a few bottles there and save a few dollars.

I have been using this product for many years, ever since my biological dentist took me off of Fluoride treatments and toothpaste. It is strong so only a small amount is needed but it really keeps the gums and teeth healthy.
Unfortunately, the cinnamon bark in this formula is way to strong for me.
